long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Track changes for your favorite cryptocurrency in a simple popup.  Bitcoin (BTC), Ethereum (ETH), Litecoin (LTC), Stacks (STX), Ripple (XRP), and over 300 others!

Relase 0.4.0
* add STX token


Release 0.3.3
* add BCD, HOT, MKR, AE, NPXS, REP, PPT
* replace VEN with VET

Release 0.3.2
* add new coin
* refactor out existing libraries to reduce size

Release 0.3.1
* add new coins

Release 0.3.0
* fix annoying mac bug
* trash icons
* label fiat conversion button
* display coin names in table instead of symbols

Release 0.2.1
* update icon
* align currency symbols where icon is not available

New Release 0.2.0:
* Now add your crypto currencies directly from the select box
* Support for many more currencies ... the top 300-ish (by market cap)
* Support for searching and adding currencies directly from select box
* Support for new fiat currency conversions:
- Australian Dollar (AUD)
- Canadian Dollar (CAD)
- Chinese Yuan (CNY)
- Euro (EUR)
- British Pound (GBP)
- Indian Rupee (INR)
- Israeli Shekel (ISL)
- Japanese Yen (JPY)
- South Korean Won (KRW)
